snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Bahamas Beach Wedding
snippet.description:
Bahamas Beach Wedding: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Bahamas Beach Wedding - http://www.bahamas-destination-wedding.com/AskGlenn

Hi I'm Glenn Ferguson, wedding officiant in Nassau Bahamas with another spotlight on weddings in the Bahamas. Today we're featuring  Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Bahamas Beach Wedding. 

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard chose a Bahamian island for their wedding earlier this month. The wedding was held on Little Hall’s Pond Cay, the private island owned by Depp in the Exuma Island chain.

Depp first purchased the island 11 years ago, after he first filmed Pirates of the Caribbean in the Bahamas. The 45-acre island has six private beaches and Depp is among the latest celebrities to get married in the Bahamas.

Take a look at the video and see the beauty that Johnny and Amber enjoyed at their beach wedding in the Bahamas.

And you have have questions about planning a Bahamas Beach wedding call me Glenn Ferguson, wedding officiant Nassau Bahamas at 1-(242)-327-2453 and I'll get you the help you need to experience your Beach wedding in the Bahamas.  

Bahamas Beach Wedding - http://www.bahamas-destination-wedding.com/AskGlenn

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard Bahamas Beach Wedding - http://youtu.be/zOMCNMc4zLI
